name: Alex's Aim Trainer (Pre-Alpha v1.2)
description:
Ever feel sad?

Is it because your aim is BAD?

yeah, that's what I thought, well guess what I made this stupid software so you can train yourself to click heads better.

The game only supports tracking aim right now, but I'm looking to add in more customization and more bot types, like flick bots etc.

Controls:

  • LMB = Primary Fire
  • R = Reload (Doesn't do anything right now)

Assets:

  • CAFOFO's Gun Sounds
  • Pelengami's Muzzle Flashes
